alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 4:56AM MST until December 15 at 12:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 55 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Mostly over the upper slopes and ridges of the Black Range and the downwind eastern slopes. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong westerly winds could topple trees, cause power interruptions, and blow about loose outdoor objects, even causing damage to light structures.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
